verbose_text: Although basal pH i was slightly lower in beta cells from stage I Fh1betaKO mice than in CTL cells (as expected from the elevated fumarate), the responses to glucose and glyceraldehyde were similar (XREF_FIG A, 6B, and 6E) : glucose and glyceraldehyde lowered pH i reversibly in both CTL and Fh1betaKO beta cells, and high-[K +] o depolarization produced a further drop in pH i.
